message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire it at a fair price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $11000. It's a fair price considering the product's value to me is $12000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm not willing to go as low as $9500, but I'm willing to compromise further. I can sell it to you for $10800. It's a good deal, considering the product's value to me is $12000.
I'm still not sure if $10800 is the best price for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
